title: PIZZA:
content:
ALL PIZZA!!!

I really don't prefer one over another. Pizza hut has stuffed crust, while Dominoes had that steak... *Drowns in drool*

title: Re: PIZZA:
content: Mmmh, every pizza.. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-drool.gif[/img] (Or well, depends a bit what's on it.)Eat your veggies!

title: Ah... yes:
content:
Your right, KR:

I don't mind what brand it is; but it cannot have veggies on it (I like olives... so I consider olive a fruit [along with tomato]; so I can have a veggi free pizza)

Hey, while we're at it, lets list our favorite toppings!!!

Extra Cheese
Sausage
Pepperoni
Cannadian Bacon
Bacon
Ham
(Any other kind of meat I missed, excluding liver sausage [[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-barf.gif[/img] ])
Olives
Any cheese!!!
Cheese in crust (Us in WI [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-love.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-love.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-love.gif[/img] cheese!!!)
(If the sauce is good[Little Ceasers has... okay pizza, but not the best sauce, so it is one that doesn't apply]) - Lots of sauce!!!
Pineapple (How could I forget!!!)
(Yes; tropical is one of my favorites, but you gotta have some meat!!!)

And more to come...

-- NAJAWA --

title: Re: Ah... yes:
content:
Hmmm, I like pineapple, cheese, tomato, pepperoni, bacon, ham, kebab meat. But it depends how they are mixed; I don't like pineapple with tuna fish, but tuna fish is good with ham etc..
This topic makes me go and have a slice.. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-garg.gif[/img] Eat your veggies!

title: Re: Ah... yes:
content:

title: Re: Ah... yes:
content:
"Is it just me, or does the Keen 1 pizza look like cold leftover pizza"
It's probably only you, I think the Keen 1 pizza looks delicious and I always get pizza hungry when seeing it. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-drool.gif[/img] It looks warm to me. And besides, I like them cold as well.Eat your veggies!

title: Pizzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzargh!
content:
Ugh... don't make me think about food right now. I ate way too much in the past six hours.

The only 'flavour' of pizza I like is Hawaiian (or Tropicale as some places call it, though other places use that same name for something completely different).

Meat and cheese in general are very low on my preferred foods list, but when they're in a form in which I don't have to think about it, I can deal with it.

A plain, simple, Pizza Hut Hawaiian pizza I can enjoy. We don't have Pizza Hut down here, so Pinky's is the next best thing, at least when it comes to cheap, home-delivered pizza. I prefer the local Pinoccios restaurant, though, as I mentioned in the other pizza thread.Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

The development of the hardware, and the greater ability to express every idea that flies into a programmers head, mean that game creators have made the new games congested with every technique in their power. The basic games behind all this are so blurred that people cant catch up. We should go back to basics like Pac-Man and play in an easier, more relaxed way. -Toru Iwatani

[url=http://jimsoft.spatang.com/]JimSoft Lair[/url]
